projects.title: lead block sports
projects.description: full-stack sports blog platform built with react, node.js/express, and mongodb. includes the main website + a separate admin dashboard allowing the author to independently update content.

projects.title: where's bosch?
projects.description: 'where's waldo?'-inspired web game built with react and firebase, featuring hieronymus bosch's 'garden of earthly delights'.

projects.title: secret society
projects.description: members-only web bulletin with secure login & authentication functionality.

projects.title: ArtCart
projects.description: demo online store featuring a shopping cart component, a searchable catalog, dynamic page routing, and a tongue-in-cheek contemporary art market theme.

projects.title: campaign website
projects.description: informational website for a real local political candidate, built from scratch using vanilla js and custom css - no frameworks.

projects.title: brassicaDB
projects.description: searchable and editable vegetable-themed inventory site created with several back-end technologies.

projects.title: now // later
projects.description: streamlined to-do list web app with a calming, minimal design.

projects.title: graces
projects.description: simple informational website for my own seasonal food business, built with react with an eye toward ease of maintenance.

projects.title: battlesquares
projects.description: 'battleship'-inspired web game exemplifying key concepts in OOP and test-driven development.

projects.title: memory game
projects.description: simple react-based memory card game highlighting react component state and lifecycle methods.

projects.title: cv generator
projects.description: single-page react app for building a custom resume with a user-selected font and accent color.

projects.title: how's the weather?
projects.description: weather app powered by data from a third-party API.

projects.title: apicius cafe
projects.description: dynamically updated single-page website for an imaginary restaurant built with pure javascript. features an original ancient rome-inspired css theme.

projects.title: admin dashboard
projects.description: design concept for an admin dashboard page.

projects.title: contact form
projects.description: contact form for an imaginary restaurant, developed as an exercise in form design and client-side form validation.

projects.title: tic-tac-toe
projects.description: early js project - simple tic-tac-toe web game with an experimental UI.

projects.title: book log
projects.description: early js project - web app to log a user's reading activity and annual reading goal.

projects.title: pointillist etch-a-sketch
projects.description: early js project - an art historical, etch-a-sketch-inspired drawing tool.

projects.title: calculator
projects.description: early js project - a fully functional digital calculator with an experimental visual design.
